data.title: Accounting Firm Princeton NJ New York CPA and Tax Services
data.meta_description: EisnerAmper is one of the largest accounting firms in the nation. With a long history serving the New York metropolitan area's tax and accounting needs, our Princeton NJ location specializes in tax services, personal wealth, accounting, audit and assurance services.
data.text:
The professionals of EisnerAmper, working through our office in Princeton, New Jersey, provide a full range of accounting, tax, advisory, and outsourcing services to a broad range of clients in both the public and private sectors. Our practice leverages the strengths and experience of more than 400 partners and 4000 professionals as they guide clients no matter their size, sector, geography, or life-cycle stage.

Our professionals believe that the trust clients put in them is paramount. Every member of the EisnerAmper team is passionate about rolling up their sleeves and working hard to help clients get down to the business of building and maintaining success. Our accounting firm works with clients as diverse as individuals and family offices; governmental entities; start-ups and mature, sophisticated financial institutions; small, middle-market, and global public companies; as well as entrepreneurial ventures across a wide range of industries and not-for-profit organizations.
